faq.title: Common Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before you start

question1.q: Is my data private and secure?
question1.a: Absolutely. Everything you share is encrypted with the same security banks use. Your conversations are completely private—we'll never share or sell your data to anyone. What you tell the AI stays with the AI.

question2.q: How does this actually help me change?
question2.a: Think of it as having a really insightful friend who notices patterns you don't. Our AI analyzes your daily conversations to spot what's really driving your eating habits. Then it gives you personalized challenges to help you build better patterns. It's like having a coach who knows your story.

question3.a: EmotionEat offers flexible pricing to fit your needs. You can explore all features and find the plan that works best for you directly in the app.

question4.q: I'm terrible at journaling. Will this work for me?
question4.a: Good news—this isn't journaling! It's more like texting a friend about your day. Just chat naturally about what happened, how you felt, and what you ate. The AI will ask helpful questions to keep the conversation going. No pressure, no blank pages.

question5.a: EmotionEat gives you everything you need: daily AI conversations to track your eating patterns, personalized challenges based on your unique habits, unlimited advice tailored to your journey, and full progress tracking so you can see how far you've come.

question6.q: Is this a replacement for therapy?
question6.a: No, and we're upfront about that. EmotionEat helps you understand your patterns and build better habits, but it's a tool—not a therapist. If you're dealing with a serious eating disorder, please work with a qualified healthcare professional. We're here to support your journey, not replace professional care.
